data.text: You hear the sounds of distressed beeping coming from a broken storefront. Taking a look, you spot three luggage gremlins poking and prodding at a security eyebot on the ground. The gremlins are cackling, bonking the robot with a stick whenever it tries to sound its alarm.

You could intervene if you wanted. You're pretty sure the robots don't have feelings, but you never know. Or you could join the gremlins if you're careful enough; they seem too distracted to notice right now. Or you could just walk away; it definitely does not need to be your problem.

text: You prepare for battle, hurrying over to press the gremlins away from the eyebot.
The three gremlins chatter and rev up their luggage trolleys, while the eyebot hovers unsteadily into the air.
You prepare for battle as the eyebot finally manages to get its siren going, hurrying over to help the gremlins deal with whatever extra security is about to arrive.
They seem surprised to see you, but aren't too picky to turn down your help against the incoming security agents.
You turn around and leave. You hear the eyebot finally manage to get its siren going a moment later.
Two burly security agents hustle past you to come to its aid; you hear the gremlins screeching.
Good thing you didn't get involved in that mess.
